name: A Shooty Bit
description: REFINED REFLEX REACTION: The most ingenious engineers this side of the supercluster have concocted a glimpse at the gaming experiences of the future. Clamber aboard THE SHOOTY BIT and blast through hordes of enemies -- each one dead-set on destruction.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Intel Core i5-2450M or better Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000 or better Storage: 30 MB available space Sound Card: Allows you to fully immerse yourself in the audio experience
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Intel Core i5-2450M or better Memory: 128 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000 or better Storage: 30 MB available space Sound Card: You probably have one of these
